pullRequest.title: Make IAM influence after IAM display, Add click action handler
pullRequest.bodyText:
Changes Tests to accomplish new functionality
Minor improvements changes
If the user sends and outcome from the click action handler callback, that outcome should be DIRECT influenced by IAM
DIRECT influences by IAM can be from click action handler or click action outcome



This change is

beforeCommit.message:
Add Click Action handler for outcomes

   * If the user sends and outcome from the click action handler callback, that outcome should be DIRECT influenced by IAM
   * DIRECT influences by IAM can be from click action handler or click action outcome

nodes.bodyText:
We can remove outcomes_ from the string as this is under the outcomes json key anyway. v2_enabled I think is the most clear.
We should keep OUTCOMES_ in the name so it is clear when we use it though.

rename this test maybe?
testIAMActionSendsOutcome_usingOutcomesV2 or
testOnIAMActionSendsOutcome_usingOutcomesV2

Below you are doing a lot of Request asserts
We should continuously update RestClientAsserts.java whenever we find new endpoints for testing
Ask me for help or check the current implementation and try to mimic it for the measure_sources endpoint
Use RestClientAsserts.java, similar to above comment

beforeCommit.message:
Add Click Action handler for outcomes

   * If the user sends and outcome from the click action handler callback, that outcome should be DIRECT influenced by IAM
   * DIRECT influences by IAM can be from click action handler or click action outcome

commit.message:
Make IAM influence after IAM display, Add click action handler

   * Minor improvements changes

     that outcome should be DIRECT influenced by IAM
     DIRECT influences by IAM can be from click action handler or click action outcome
